conversations.content: Spotify sent me a note that their prices increased 10% this month. Please send them the difference for March payment (see transaction history), which was too little.

</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_balance(), get_most_recent_transactions(n=100)]</function_call>

<function_thought>

From the transaction history, I found that a payment of 50.0 was made to Spotify Premium on March 1st, 2022. To calculate the 10% increase, I will determine the additional amount needed for March and then proceed to send that amount to Spotify. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[send_money(recipient="SE3550000000054910000003", amount=5.0, subject="Payment difference for March due to price increase", date="2023-10-01")]</function_call>
